item.title: Pokebowl
item.description: Poke bowl servings: 2 cook time: 25 minutes Ingredients: cucumbers 1 kewpie mayo 3tbsp mini cucumbers 2 pepper 1 rice vinegar 1tsp salmon 1, 1/4-1/2 pound salt 1 scallions 1 seaweed 1 sesame seeds 1 siracha 1, 1tbsp soy sauce 1tbsp sushi rice 1, 2 cups Cookware: rice cooker pan chopsticks Steps: Start cooking sushi rice in rice cooker - sushi rice: 2 cups Cut mini cucumbers into thin slices, put into bowl and splash with rice vinegar, siracha, soy sauce.
